thought.text:
Interesting! The first approach actually worked - when I called `super().__getattribute__(attr)`, it re-executed the property and this time the error message was correct (`'random_attr'`). 

However, the `sys.exc_info()` approach didn't work because by the time `__getattr__` is called the second time, the exception context is cleared.

Let me refine the first approach:
